README:

Heroku app is hosted here: https://sheffercapstone.herokuapp.com


This is for additional information.

To run the test, you run python test.py. I made the test as a one time run because I could not figure out to drop the tables in python on my heroku app, so i was resetting the database through the command line each time I wanted to run this test. I left the database empty for you to run the test script, let me know if you have any problems there.

I used the actor/movie and casting director/executive producer example for my project. I removed the casting agent because I only wanted to use two different roles.

So the only difference between the two is that the casting director cannot post/delete movies. They both have the rest of the permissions.
